summary: Frontend testing completed for Controllo Mensile page - POS Banca integration and Annulli card. All requested features are working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Controllo Mensile page fully tested. POS Banca integration working correctly with data from estratto_conto collection. Annulli card shows 0 with 'N/D negli XML' subtitle as expected.
